summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3336, for the improvement of the alley in block 3, Hazeltine Heights Addition, and in block 7, of Ayer & Walker's Addition; being the alley between 36th Avenue and 37th Avenue, extending from East James Street to East Cherry Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41221 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
